message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I really think that's the highest I can go.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is a fair offer, the value of this product to me is quite a bit higher.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,750 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,200, but that's as high as I can go.
